amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to saving Medicare.

vote.text: Amendment SA 796 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 796 proposed by Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S1853-1856, S1870; text: CR S1853) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to saving Medicare.
